General.Name: UmweltBank AG
General.Description: UmweltBank AG provides various banking products and services in Germany. The company offers investment products, savings plans, and retirement provision products, as well as construction financing and personal loans to private customers. It also provides business accounts, company pension schemes, environmental funds, green bonds, and real estate finance, as well as finance for photovoltaic and wind power. In addition, the company offers insurance products, as well as online banking services. UmweltBank AG was founded in 1997 and is based in Nuremberg, Germany.
